cross
Class Factory

java.lang.Object
  cross.Factory

public class Factory
extends java.lang.Object

Factory for the creation of processing chains. It must be configured prior to any call to createCommandSequence. The factory will try to figure out what your intention is, by inspecting the configuration and the command-line input. Alternatively, you can set up the pipeline completely on your own, but beware, there is only partial requirements checking between pipeline stages as of now. You have to ensure, that commands early in the chain provide the data needed by those commands later in the chain. If you need branching behaviour, consider setting named properties for later pipeline elements to use, or set up multiple instances of Maltcms with different configurations.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
